Manholes are round because that way they won't accidentally fall through the hole.	人孔是圓的，因為這樣人孔蓋就不會意外地掉進洞裡。
You should have known better than to take an examination without preparing for it.	你應該知道要為考試作準備。
A connection between personality and blood type has not been scientifically proven.	科學上，血型和性格的關聯性沒有被證明。
His dress is that of a gentleman, but his speech and behavior are those of a clown.	他衣着像個紳士，言行舉止卻像個小丑。
I've just spoken to your French teacher and he says you're doing well in his class.	我剛跟你的法語老師談過話，他說你在課堂上表現得很好。
We'll need a head hunting agency to find the right man for this executive position.	我們需要人力仲介公司幫我們找到合適的人來擔任這個管理職位。
Even though I studied French for three years in school, I'm not good at speaking it.	即使我在學校學習了三年，我仍然不擅長說法語。
He came back not because he was homesick, but because he was running short of money.	他不是因為想家，而是因為沒錢纔回來的。
I know you've been waiting a long time, but could you wait just a little bit longer?	我知道你已經等很久了，但你能再等一小會嗎？
If you want something to be done right, sometimes you've just got to do it yourself.	如果你想做對一件事，有時候你得親力親爲。
The company's competitive edge will be eroded if system engineers continue to leave.	如果系統工程師繼續離開，公司的競爭優勢將會被削弱。
Visitors are usually asked to remove their shoes before they enter a Japanese house.	訪客通常在進入一戶日本人家之前會被要求脫鞋。
Why don't we stop arguing over these piddling matters and get to the issues at hand?	為什麼我們糾纏細枝末節而不進入正題呢？
A growing child who doesn't seem to have much energy perhaps needs medical attention.	一個成長中的孩子如果沒有充足的能量，可能需要藥物治療。
All things considered, I think you should go back home and take care of your parents.	全盤考慮後，我覺得你應該回家，照顧你的父母。
In London, the police are always worried about finding a bomb on the train or subway.	在倫敦，警察總是擔心在列車或地鐵上發現炸彈。
Ladies and gentlemen, due to an accident at the airport, our arrival will be delayed.	女士們，先生們，由於機場的意外情況，我們的著陸將被推遲。
Democracy is the worst form of government, except all the others that have been tried.	除了那些我們嘗試過的政府形態，民主是最差的那種了。
If you could go back and start your life again, from what age would you like to start?	假如能回到過去讓人生再來一遍的話，你希望能回到幾歲的時候？
Thank you very much for lending me $500 when I was having difficulty making ends meet.	謝謝你在我貧困潦倒之時借給我$500。
At lunchtime today, our usual restaurant was closed because of a funeral in the family.	今天午餐時間，我們常去的飯館關門了，因為他們家在辦喪事。
The amount of paper produced by a country is closely related to its cultural standards.	一個國家紙的產量和它的文明程度密切相關。
Tom is the head of the company in name only. His son makes all the important decisions.	湯姆名義上市公司的領導。他兒子做所有重大決策。
Tom's mother is a nurse at the hospital that's across the street from where Mary lives.	湯姆的媽媽是一名護士，她所在的醫院就在瑪麗住的那條街的對面。
Eat a live frog every morning, and nothing worse will happen to you the rest of the day.	每天早上喫一隻活青蛙, 那麼你一天中其他的時間就不會發生什麼更糟糕的事了。
I don't think that it's very likely that Tom will tell us the truth about what happened.	我不認爲湯姆會把事情的真相告訴我們。
I had to change clothes because what I was wearing wasn't appropriate for the situation.	我必須要換衣服，因爲我現在穿的衣服不適合這個環境。
Because of the problem of air pollution, the bicycle may some day replace the automobile.	因為空氣汙染的問題，也許有一天自行車會取代汽車。
Computers are certainly playing an important role in our life, whether we like it or not.	無論我們是否喜歡電腦，它在我們的生活中始終起着重要的作用。
I know that you've been waiting a long time, but could you wait just a little bit longer?	我知道你已經等很久了，但你能再等一小會嗎？
Which translation of this book do you think is better, the French one or the English one?	你覺得這本書的哪個譯本比較好？法語的還是英語的？
I like this picture, not just because it's famous, but because it really is a masterpiece.	我喜歡這幅畫，不僅是因爲它的名氣，而是因爲它真的是一個傑作。
In theory, there is no difference between theory and practice. But, in practice, there is.	理論上說，理論和實踐沒有區別。但實踐上說，是有的。
One out of 455 women doesn't realize she's pregnant until the twentieth week of pregnancy.	455名婦女中會有一名直到懷孕第二十週前沒有意識到自己懷孕。
Owing to its landmass, the Antarctic has an air temperature lower than that of the Arctic.	南極因為有大陸，所以氣溫低於北極。
Because of its origins, Canadian English has features of both American and British English.	由於它的起源，加拿大英語具有美國英語和​​英國英語兩者的特色。
For the other 600 million people, English is either a second language or a foreign language.	對於其他的六億人口而言，英語不是第二語言就是外語。
Lonely people tend to be afraid of meeting others, which ensures they will always be lonely.	孤獨的人會孤獨，是因為他畏懼他人。
That place's food is delicious and their prices are low. However, their location isn't good.	那家館子物美價廉，美中不足的是他們糟糕的位置。
When people meet, first impressions determine more than 50 percent of whatever happens next.	在人際交往中，第一印象決定着將要發生的事情內容的百分之五十以上。
"There's an apostrophe missing. It's and its are different." "I know. It was a typing error."	“你漏寫了一個撇號。it's和its是有分別的。” “我知道。是我打錯了。”
In Japan, it rains quite a bit during our rainy season which is from mid-June until mid-July.	在日本，在我們的雨季常常下雨，雨季一般在六月中旬至七月中旬。
Right now, we have blueberries, blackberries, cherries, strawberries, peaches and nectarines.	現在我們有藍莓、黑莓、櫻桃、草莓、桃子和油桃。
Throughout the five years of painful cancer treatments, he managed to keep a stiff upper lip.	這五年痛苦的癌症治療他終於堅持下來了。
When we started out, our band could only find small clubs in small cities that would hire us.	我們的樂隊剛起步時，只有小城市裏的小俱樂部僱我們。
Abraham Lincoln, the 16th president of the United States, was born in a log cabin in Kentucky.	伯拉罕·林肯，美國第16任總統，生於肯塔基州的一個簡陋的小屋裏。
For quantities of 20 or more, we can allow you a special discount of 10% on the prices quoted.	20個以上九折特惠。
I can't believe you are eating something the doctor has told you repeatedly you shouldn't eat.	真的不敢相信你在喫醫生叮囑不要食用的東西。
I think Tom is going to be pretty mad when he finds out that the painting he bought is a fake.	我覺得當湯姆發現他買來的畫是贗品的時候，他會很生氣。
If we were supposed to talk more than listen, we would have been given two mouths and one ear.	如果我們應該少聽多說話, 那麼我們應該得到兩個嘴巴一隻耳朵纔是。
Optimists see opportunities in disasters while pessimists find disasters in every opportunity.	樂觀者在災禍中看到機會，悲觀者在機會中看到災禍。
The ecological footprint of a country is closely related to its level of economic development.	生態印跡與一國的經濟發展程度密切相關。
Since the orbits are elliptical, the planets do not always have the same distance from the Sun.	由於軌道是橢圓形的，行星和太陽之間的距離不會總是相同。
Tom tried to return the swimsuit for a larger size, but the clerk told him that wasn't allowed.	湯姆試過還回泳衣來換成更大一號的，但是員工告訴他那是不被允許的。
During the Depression in the 1930's, many wealthy people lost everything in the stock market crash.	在十九世紀三十年代的大蕭條時期，許多富人在股市崩盤中失去了一切。
I think that Tom is going to be pretty mad when he finds out that the painting he bought is a fake.	我覺得當湯姆發現他買來的畫是贗品的時候，他會很生氣。
Some people clung to tree branches for several hours to avoid being washed away by the floodwaters.	爲了不被洪水沖走，有的人緊緊地抱着樹幹長達數個鐘頭。
The handyman was supposed to arrive at twelve noon, but got stuck in a traffic jam for a few hours.	這個工人本來應該在中午十二點到達, 但他被交通堵塞困住了幾個小時。
My parents usually speak to each other in French, even though my mother is a native English speaker.	我父母通常用法語對話，即使我母親的母語是英語。
The large crowd roared in approval as Mark Knopfler played the first few bars of "Money for Nothing".	就像馬克·諾弗勒早期演唱的歌曲《金錢無用》一樣，絕大多數的人依然高呼贊成“金錢無用論”。
If you'd listen a little more carefully to what the teacher says, you'd probably be able to understand.	假如你在老師講課的時候再集中一點去聽講的話，你應該就能弄明白了。
Tom's daughter pretended not to know him when he came to pick her up from school in his battered old car.	當湯姆開着他破舊的雷澤車來接女兒放學時，他的女兒假裝不認識他。
Many conservationists fear the continuing slaughter of whales is pushing these animals towards extinction.	許多自然環境保護主義者擔心持續屠殺鯨魚正推動這些動物走向滅絕。
Last year in the Philippines, earthquakes and tidal waves resulted in the deaths of more than 6,000 people.	菲律賓去年地震和海嘯造成了超過6000人的死亡。
"Is that Tom calling again?" "Yes. He calls every evening these days. I shouldn't have given him my number."	“又是湯姆的電話？” “嗯。最近他每天晚上都會打過來。當時就不該給他我的號碼的。”
My mother speaks French better than my father speaks English, so they usually speak to each other in French.	我母親的法語比我父親的英語要好，所以他們通常用法語交流。
Tom didn't know how to translate the word "computer" because the people he was talking to had never seen one.	湯姆不知如何翻譯“計算機”一詞，因爲同他談話的人從未見過一臺。
Tom doesn't like to use the term "a person of color" because he thinks it implies that white people have no color.	湯姆不喜歡使用”有色人種“這個術語，因爲他認爲，根據這種說法白種人沒有顏色。
If you don't want to put on sunscreen, that's your problem. Just don't come complaining to me when you get a sunburn.	你不想塗防曬霜是你的問題，但是曬傷了不要來抱怨。
Even now, I occasionally think I'd like to see you. Not the you that you are today, but the you I remember from the past.	即使是現在，我偶爾還是想見到你。不是今天的你，而是我記憶中曾經的你。
It's very easy to sound natural in your own native language, and very easy to sound unnatural in your non-native language.	你很容易把母語說得通順流暢，卻很容易把非母語說得不自然。
I got fired from the company, but since I have a little money saved up, for the time being, I won't have trouble with living expenses.	雖然我被公司解僱了，但是我還有點存款，所以目前不用擔心生計問題。
If a person has not had a chance to acquire his target language by the time he's an adult, he's unlikely to be able to reach native speaker level in that language.	如果一個人在成人前沒有機會習得目標語言，他對該語言的認識達到母語者程度的機會是相當小的。
